author: Chih-Wei Hsu and Cheng-Ru Lin
title: A Comparison of Methods for Multi-class Support Vector Machines
venue: Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering National Taiwan University
window: section we present experimental results on several problems from the Statlog collection [20] and the UCI Repository of machine learning databases [1]. From UCI Repository we choose the following datasets: iris, wine, glass and vowel. Those problems had already been tested in [27]. From Statlog collection we choose all multi-class datasets: vehicle, segment, dna, satimage, letter, and shuttle. Note
